column1: Verse Text
Gonya P'ilato akilagiza Jesu apigwe vikotho.
Kidza ao shikari, makitengeza kiremba cha miya na makimuvika Jesu kitswani. Kidza makihala riguwo ra rangi ya zambarau makimuvika.
Na makiamba, “K'una ut'u muheshimiwa muthawali wa Ayahudi?” Na makimupiga makofi.
P'ilato achambola mo nyumbani kaheri na akiambira o Ayahudi akiamba, “Nindamwambozera haha ndze yuyu mut'u, mumanye kukala siona kukala adzahenda kihendo kii chochosi.”
Bai Jesu achambola ndze kuno adzavala kirembache cha miya na riguwo ra zambarau. Gonya P'ilato akiambira o at'u, “H'aya thiyuno!”

Bai o alombi abomu na arindzi ao marihomona Jesu, mapiga k'ululu na kuamba, “Musulubishe! Musulubishe!” P'ilato akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Muhaleni enye, mumusulubishe. Kwani mino simona na kosa rorosi.”
Aryahu Ayahudi makimujibu makiamba, “Siswi huna sheria, na kulingana na sheria iyo vinav̱irya afwe, kwa kukala wadziamba ni Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Bai P'ilato arihosikira maneno gaga, wakaza kungirwa ni woga zaidhi.
Kidza achangira kaheri mo nyumbani mwakwe, hamwenga na Jesu. Gonya akimuza akiamba, “Kwenu ni hiko we?” Ela Jesu akinyamala zii.
Ndo, P'ilato akimuza akiamba, “Mbona k'unidzigidzya? Unamanya mino nina wadimi wa kukuricha huru hedu kukusulubisha?”

Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “K'ungere na wadimi wa kuhenda kit'u chochosi kwangu, kala kup'ewerwe wadimi uwo kula dzulu mulunguni. Kwa vizho ye mut'u adziyenireha kwako adzahenda dambi bomu kuriko uwe.”

Neno riri ra Jesu ramuhendya P'ilato alole ngira yoyosi ya kumuricha Jesu huru. Ela aryahu Ayahudi makipiga londzo kudzigidzya, “Ukimuruhusu mut'u yuyu akale huru be hundamanya kukala k'u musena wa Kaisari. Unamanya kukala mut'u akidziamba ni muthawali haha, be a kinyume cha Kaisari.”
P'ilato arihosikira vizho akimwamboza Jesu ko ndze kaheri. Kidza akikelesi kahi za kihiche cha hukumu kiricho were ki hat'u haifwaho Muhala wa Mawe ambaho kwa luga ya Kieburania hanaifwa Gabath'a.
Siku ii were ni siku ya Kuthayarishira P'asaka, saa here sitha vivi. P'ilato akiambira o Ayahudi akiamba, “H'aya Muthawali wenu siye!”

Ela ao makipiga k'ululu makiamba, “Muse! Muse! Musulubishe!” P'ilato akiauza akiamba, “Vidze munamala nimusulubishe muthawali wenu?” O alombi abomu makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Siswi k'ahuna muthawali mungine isihokala Kaisari.”
Kidza P'ilato akimulazha Jesu kwao mamusulubishe.
Bai makimuhala Jesu na machenda naye kuno adzatsukula musalabawe muhaka hat'u haifwaho Ribeshe ra Kitswa hedu kwa Kieburania Gologoth'a.
Haho makimusulubisha hamwenga na at'u angine airi, mumwenga kuku na mungine kuku, na Jesu akikala a ho kahikahi yao.
Kabila ya vivi P'ilato were adzalagiza kukala maore kibao. Kidza akilagiza kwamba cho kibao makilunganye na wo musalaba na kukiora vivi:
Haryahu hat'u marihokala mamusulubisha Jesu were ni hehi na wo mudzi. Ndosa Ayahudi anji makishoma cho kibao, nacho chere chaorwa kahi za luga ya Kieburania na ya Kiyunani na ya Kilatini.
Kidza aryahu alombi abomu a Kiyahudi makimwamba P'ilato, “Usiore ‘Muthawali wa Ayahudi,’ ela ora kukala yuyu mut'u wadziamba, ‘Mimi ni Muthawali wa Ayahudi.’ ”
Ela P'ilato akiamba, “Vizho nidzizhondhika ni vizho.”

Shikari aryahu marihogonya kumusulubisha Jesu magazha mavwaloge kahi za mafungu mane, ili kila shikari apate fungu. Ela k'amatharurire valore ra ndani bule. Riryahu valo ra ndani rere k'arigwizanyirwe na ringine mana rere rashonwa rere mwenga.
Ndosa shikari makiambirana, “Nahusiritharure, hat'uhe nahuripigire k'ura hulole chamba rindahalwa ni h'ani.” Vivi virihokala zhathimiza garyahu Maoro gaambago,
Bai vizho ndizho marizhohenda o shikari. Hehi na ho musalabani were haimire mameye Jesu na nduguye iye mameye na Maryamu mukaza Kilopa, na Maryamu Magidalena.
Kidza Jesu arihomona mameye na ye mwanafundzi ariyemuhendza aimire hehi, akimwamba mameye, “M'ama, lola yuyu vikara nde mwanao”
Gonya akimwambira yuyahu mwanafundzi akiamba, “Vikara yuyu nde mameyo” Bai yuyahu mwanafundzi bada ya vivi akimuhala ye Maryamu mameye Jesu na achenda naye mudzini kwakwe.
Badaye Jesu kuno akimanya kukala adzagonya kaziye yosi, akiamba, “Nina k'ihu” Bai Maoro gakithimira.
Na haho were hana kiya kithele siki. Bai makihala buwa makirivika mo sikini, gonya makimugolozeza Jesu anyunye.
Bai Jesu akinyunya ro siki, na akiamba, “Vidzagoma.” Gonya akizanya kitswache akitoka roho.

Vikara kwa kukala were ni siku ya kuthayarishira Sabato, o Ayahudi were k'amendzi yo miri isale ho misalabani kahi za yo siku ya Sabato, mana yo Sabato iyo were ni bomu. Bai machendamuvoya P'ilato kukala go magulu ga o asulubiwa gabandwe.
Kwa vizho shikari machendabanda magulu ga yuyahu wa kwandza na ga yuyahu wa hiri,
ela marihofika kwa Jesu makiona kukala adzagonya kufwa, kwa vizho k'amabandire maguluge.
Ela shikari mumwenga akimudunga fumo ra lwavuni. Bai vichache zhenye milatso na madzi vichambola kula kahi za ro ranga ra lwavuni.
Ye muori wa maut'u gaga waona gakihendeka naye adzanena dzulu ya ut'u uu ili ninwi nanwi mukuluhire. Go arigoganena ni ga ujeri naye anamanya kukala ananena ujeri.
Bai vivi zhathimiza go Maoro gaambago, “K'amandabanda musozawe hatha mumwenga.”
Na kidza kuna Maoro mangine gaambago, “Mandamulola iye mariyemudunga fumo.”

Bada ya vivi mut'u mumwenga wa mudzi wa Arimath'ea aifwaye Josefu achendamuza P'ilato, kala anadima kuuhala mwiri wa Jesu akauzike. Yuyu Josefu were ni mwanafundzi wa Jesu wa kisiri-siri, kwa kukala were anaagoha o Ayahudi. Bai P'ilato akikubali. Kwa vizho Josefu achendamuhala Jesu.
Kidza Nikodemu ariyekala ho chaho wamwendera Jesu na usiku wakwenda na marashi manji sana garigo uzihowe were ni here rathili gana mwenga. Marashi gaga were ni mutsanganyiko wa manemane na udhi.
O anaalume airi mauhala wo mwiri wa Jesu na makiulinga-linga ts'andza ya kitani na go marashihere adha ra Kiyahudi ra kuthayarisha lufu lukazikwe ririzho.
Vikara haho Jesu arihosulubiwa were hana munda na kahi za wo munda were hana mbira mbisha ambayo were k'aidzazikwa mut'u.
Bai kwa kukala were ni siku ya Kiyahudi ya Mathayarisho na kwa kukala were yo mbira i hehi, makimwika Jesu mumo.
